chapter.text: Ware wa kono machi ni oite chikau
Anata wa kono machi no (ijūken o motsu) jūmindearu
Umu mono to umareru mono ni kakete (chikau)
Hontōni ware wa, ningen o rōku suru yō ni tsukutta
Kare (ningen) wa, nanimono mo, jibun o sayū suru mono wa nai to kangaeru no ka
Kare wa,`watashi wa taihen'na zaisan o tsuiyashita.' To iu
Kare wa, dare mo kare o miteinai to kangaeru no ka
Ware wa, kare no tame ni ryōme o tsukuttade wanai ka
matahitotsu no shita to futatsu no kuchibiru o
Sarani futatsunomichi o kare ni shimeshita (de wanai ka)
Daga kare wa, kewashī michi o torou to wa shinai
Kewashī michi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Soreha) dorei o kaihō shi
matawa kiga no hi ni wa shokumotsu o dashite
chikai enja no minashigo o
matawa hidoku awarena hinja o (yashinau koto)
Sore kara shinkō suru mono ni natte nintai no tame ni hagemashi ai, tagaini shinsetsu, onjō o tsukushi au (kotodearu)
Korera wa migite no nakamadearu
Daga waga shirushi o kyohi suru mono, kare-ra wa hidarite no nakamadearu
Kare-ra no ue ni wa, gōka ga ōikabusarudearou
